WorkItem.Description:
User Smartie posted in the addon ticket tracker...
 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. File > Load from Battle.net
2. Enter EU - Azjol-Nerub - Mayara
 
What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
It should load my character. It doesn't and get stuck on the "Downloading Character Data..."
 
What version of the product are you using?
http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php
 
Do you have an error log of what happened?
No
 
Please provide any additional information below.
If I load a character from a realm without a hyphon it works.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Problem with Server Names with Hyphens

Comments.Message: You stated the web link for Rawr as it's version. The version is on the bottom right-hand corner of Rawr.
I still cannot load my character from the armory. I'm waiting for this functionality before I use rawr.
Smartie, use the Addon instead for now.

This isn't working again.

Addtionally, if you return to rawr after closing it, it has the saved value of "Azjolnerub" instead of "Azjol-Nerub"
